name: Valor 1PP00 Series
description: Valor 1PP00 Series is our signature series pigmented acrylic primer formulated to seal porous interior surfaces such as new drywall, plaster, masonry, block, brick, wood, and wallboard. Valor 1pp00 primer provides maximum enamel holdout for either flat or enamel or latex or alkyd topcoats. Performance benefits include a low VOC, low odor, antimicrobial, and environmentally friendly finish that was designed for use with our valor series topcoat finishes. Valor primer contains bio-pruf antimicrobial agents for long lasting inhibition of the growth of stain and odor causing bacteria, mold, and mildew on the paint film. Valor was designed to address the needs of architects, homebuilders, professional paint contractors, interior designers, and d-I-yâ€™s who have environmental concerns in their applications. Valor is ideal for use in healthcare, educational, institutions, retail and commercial buildings, business offices, and residential dwellings. The valor series topcoats are available in flat, lo-luster, and semi gloss finishes.
